body_html:
Correct, we already use the docker option "--net=host" along with --rm --ipc=host and -v for volume mappings.

With the same network stack, your current port management scheme will work like before.

There is no current port management scheme. SLURM, PBSPro and LSF do not handle network port management.

FYI, many HPC application (including at least one Deep Learning Framework) use MPI.
